title: PM to launch Sehat Card distribution for entire Punjab in Lahore today
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 31 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan is scheduled to visit Lahore today wherein he would launch the distribution of Naya Pakistan Sehat Card for the entire population of Punjab province.
The ceremony would be held at the Governor House.
This revolutionary universal health coverage program would enable each family to avail the medical treatment up to Rs 1 million a year.
Later, the prime minister would also chair different meetings on administrative and political affairs, law and order as well as development projects.
